import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Helmet } from 'react-helmet-async'; import { useAuth } from '../../contexts/AuthContext'; import { Mail, Lock, Loader } from 'lucide-react'; import LoadingSpinner from '../../components/UI/LoadingSpinner'; const Login = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ email: '', password: '', }); const { login, isLoggingIn } = useAuth(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const handleChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value, }); }; const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); login(formData); }; return ( <> Login - College Transport Management System

Sign in to your account

Or{' '} create a new account

Forgot your password?
); }; export default Login;
